name: Penguins (Overdrive Games)
description:
Penguins is a very cool game about flying penguins who try to knock each other off platforms.

Penguins is locally 2 player meaning you can play with a friend on the same computer!

Player 1 uses WASD, Player 2 uses Up, left, Down, Right.

V 0.14 Update

-New android support! (At Last!)

-Large buttons for Mobile modes
